description: Selvaraj Ranjith Kumara Vs Hon. Attorney General before Hon. Wickum A. Kaluarachchi, J.
parties: Selvaraj Ranjith Kumara Vs Hon. Attorney General
keywords: - Considering contradictions and omissions which are not material. - Duty of the prosecution to establish the chain of productions. -Evidence not cross-examined ought to be accepted. -Improbable dock statement does not create a reasonable doubt. -What is a reasonable doubt
legistation: -Section 54 A (b), (d) of the Poisons, Opium and Dangerous Drugs Ordinance as amended.
